channel.title: Question about Case
channel.description:
Ok, I'm using an modified Project Czar (Heavily modified) and I got a question about Case.
Is it possible to spawn an NPC after an Case been used, for [b][u]example[/u][/b] if someone uses the Ancient Altar, an NPC will spawn at it. This isn't for the Ancient Altar, it was just used for an example.
I searched and find 2 topics wich didn't really help me.
Thanks in advance.
Sincerly, Dealman.

item.title: Question about Case
item.dc:creator: @huggies huggies
item.description:
@huggies wrote:

Thanks for all replies! I will try it as soon as I find one to compile my client.
EDIT:

case 6821: // Ahrim Sacrophagus server.npcHandler.newNPC(2025, 3555, 9703, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(npcID), false); sendMessage("This is an prototype!"); }break;

That didn’t work. I tried both hieghtLevel -1 and 1. Neither worked. And I’m pretty sure it’s -1. Also not even the message comes…

EDIT: By looking in client I now found that the Sacrophaguses are located in an -1 area. I also tried another code and no results. Neither the message will come when I search it.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about Case
item.dc:creator: @ChemicalReaction1 ChemicalReaction™
item.description:
@ChemicalReaction1 wrote:

case 6821: // Ahrim Sacrophagus server.npcHandler.newNPC(npcID, xcoords, ycoords, heightLevel, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(npcID), false); sendMessage("message!"); break;
No need for closing brace.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about Case
item.dc:creator: @veki94 veki94
item.description:
@veki94 wrote:

case 6821: // Ahrim Sacrophagus server.npcHandler.newNPC(npcID, xcoords, ycoords, heightLevel, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(npcID), false); sendMessage("message!"); } break;
Lol,I give it a try,tho it may doesn’t work lol.
But this just spawns an npc.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about Case
item.dc:creator: @huggies huggies
item.description:
@huggies wrote:

That’s a problem, I don’t have that command. Paste yours please and I’ll try.

case 6821: // Ahrim Sacrophagus { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4)); if (newNPC >= 0) { server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 0), heightLevel, absX + 10, absY + 10, absX + -10, absY + -10, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(newNPC), false); sendMessage("This option is an prototype!"); } break;

Been searching a little in my client and I got this, gonna try it soon. On a different computer so my compiler won’t work. (No admin privilegies).

Read full topic

item.title: Question about Case
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Use the spawn new npc from your ::npc command

Read full topic

item.title: Question about Case
item.dc:creator: @huggies huggies
item.description:
@huggies wrote:

Well I’m working on my Barrows system, it all works fine except the Sacrophagus’. The item ID is 6821 wich must make it “Case 6821:”. As the Ancient Altar is item ID 6552, and it uses “Case 6552”.

Well I want Ahrim(NPC ID 2025). to spawn when you search his Sacrophagus. I got co-ordinates and all. But not the code(s).

I tried this to send a message when searched it.

case 6821: // Ahrim Sacrophagus { sendMessage("This option will come soon!"); } break;

It didn’t work. Between I’m pretty novice at this, but I’m learning fast.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about Case
item.dc:creator: @veki94 veki94
item.description:
@veki94 wrote:

It is possible I think,tell more about what you really want.

Read full topic
